title: 99. Ego, Codependency, & Relationships
description:
Hey sis!

This week we are talking all about the role of the ego in codependency and how shame & people pleasing keeps us from thriving in life like we DESERVE to.

Make sure to register for Nothing Was the Same Week here, a week of *free* live events (hosted by me!) designed to help you. Reclaim. Who. TF. You. Are.

 

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
